about_the_game:
PRESENTATION

This is a classic 2D old-school RPG in the style of the retro Super NES and Genesis RPGs such as Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest.

Zeke comes from a long lineage of Wardens, gifted individuals who are tasked with protecting their hometown with their lives. Proud of his heritage and passionated about his duty, his job is the most importante thing for him, along with his relationship with Samza and Temerius, his childhoold friends.

When Temerius arrives in Eaglemoor Town, Zeke's town, after one of his travels, Zeke's fate as a Warden is finally sealed.

On his quest to protect his hometown and live up to his lineage, he will learn from love, pain, friendship, death and ultimately, life.

FEATURES

  • A moving storyline about duty and friendship

  • A varied selection of locations to explore

  • Freedom to explore at your own pace and order

  • Three difficulty levels to choose from, at any time

  • Auto-save function

  • Mouse Support

  • 10 to 20 hours of gameplay, depending on one's play style

name: Soul Oath

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 or higher
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

short_description: Help Zeke on his quest to protect his hometown and live up to his lineage, as he will learn from love, pain, friendship, death and ultimately, life, in this classic RPG worth about 15 hours of playtime.
